resources.string: To be able to fully enjoy your %1$s experience, please accept all the permissions.
To be able to fully enjoy your %1$s experience, please accept all permissions in the app\'s settings.
You need to enable Storage Permission to allow the app to read game data from your storage in order to play the game.
You need to enable the Contacts Permission to be able to use Google Play Games Services, including Achievements and Profile Backup.
